Articles.Content:
-Taken from the Atalis Industries Brochure-

Hello and welcome to Atalis Industries Aerospace Division! I'm Head Scientist here to tell you all about what our company provides to your company or country! We offer a wide variety of vehicles ranging from small amphibious aircraft to gigantic, interplanetary capital ships! We also sell a wide assortment of ground vehicles to compliment our aircraft and spaceships! So go ahead, take a look at the selection below as we prepare to release them to the public for the first time!

Atmospheric Aircraft

AF-23

This medium sized jet aircraft is a bit touchy on the controls, but is a great flyer overall. Can be armed by request!

Add On(s) used:

B9 Aerospace

Firespitter

VF-12

This amphibious VTOL aircraft is very easy to use and control. It is also very rugged, so don't tense up if you land on the water a bit to hard!

Add On(s) used:

Firespitter

LLL (In Add On Dev.)

AF-13

This push engine seaplane is great fun to fly! Though try not to do any crazy maneuvers in it!

Add On(s) used:

Firespitter

B9 Aerospace

R3 Aircraft Carriers (The Struts)

HL-1X

This odd looking helicopter is very easy to control and has a docking port on the bottom, so you can lift whatever cargo you see fit! In this picture, we see the Atalis Industries M2 Drone Tank being airlifted by the improved HL-1X. Be warned though, this aircraft eats up fuel like no tomorrow!

Add On(s) used:

Firespitter

R3 Aircraft Carriers (The Struts)

LLL (In Add On Dev.)

Pirated Weaponry

Rubber Band Inc. Caterpillar Tracks Alpha

Please check back often as our company is constantly creating new and better vehicles and aircraft! Download links will be up soon.

Edited June 24, 2013 by Avalant
I like it! never had the guts to mess with aircraft... impressive though
I like it too! Very neat use of parts to create clean simple and airworthy looking machines!
does the clear Interior view on the first plane come with the latest firespitter?

does the clear Interior view on the first plane come with the latest firespitter?

Ya sorry, I forgot it came from somewhere else. I'm right now hunting around for the specific thread/page it came from. Also spaceport is kind of being an ass right now, so could anyone recommend an easy to use file sharing website?
